CustomField.description: BODEV-4313: A formula field to indicate if the product is for Enterprise Pricing or not. This is a temporary field.
CustomField.formula:
/* A formula field to return if the line item is an Enterprise Pricing proudct. This formula was needed in order to create a roll-up summary field on Opp to count up # of Enterprise Pricing products. In order to use this attribute in the roll-up summary field, the formula has to be based on Product Name to avoid object reference. */
OR( CONTAINS(Name_rus__c, "Content Operations Ultimate"), CONTAINS(Name_rus__c, "DAM Essentials"), CONTAINS(Name_rus__c, "DAM Advanced"), CONTAINS(Name_rus__c, "DAM Ultimate"), CONTAINS(Name_rus__c, "DAM Custom"), CONTAINS(Name_rus__c, "CX Omnichannel Essentials"), CONTAINS(Name_rus__c, "CX Omnichannel Advanced"), CONTAINS(Name_rus__c, "CX Omnichannel Ultimate"), CONTAINS(Name_rus__c, "CX Omnichannel Custom"), CONTAINS(Name_rus__c, "CX User Community Essentials"), CONTAINS(Name_rus__c, "CX User Community Ultimate"), CONTAINS(Name_rus__c, "CX User Community Custom"), CONTAINS(Name_rus__c, "Content Operations Essentials"), CONTAINS(Name_rus__c, "Content Operations Advanced"), CONTAINS(Name_rus__c, "Content Operations Custom"), CONTAINS(Name_rus__c, "Premier Plus Success Package"), CONTAINS(Name_rus__c, "DAM Essentials setup"), CONTAINS(Name_rus__c, "DAM Advanced setup"), CONTAINS(Name_rus__c, "DAM Ultimate setup"), CONTAINS(Name_rus__c, "DAM Custom setup"), CONTAINS(Name_rus__c, "CX Omnichannel Essentials setup"), CONTAINS(Name_rus__c, "CX Omnichannel Advanced setup"), CONTAINS(Name_rus__c, "CX Omnichannel Ultimate setup"), CONTAINS(Name_rus__c, "CX Omnichannel Custom setup"), CONTAINS(Name_rus__c, "CX User Community Essentials setup"), CONTAINS(Name_rus__c, "CX User Community Advanced setup"), CONTAINS(Name_rus__c, "CX User Community Ultimate setup"), CONTAINS(Name_rus__c, "CX User Community Custom setup"), CONTAINS(Name_rus__c, "Content Operations Essentials setup"), CONTAINS(Name_rus__c, "Content Operations Advanced setup"), CONTAINS(Name_rus__c, "Content Operations Ultimate setup"), CONTAINS(Name_rus__c, "Content Operations Custom setup"), CONTAINS(Name_rus__c, "Batch of 1M assets"), CONTAINS(Name_rus__c, "Batch of 5 Billion asset requests"), CONTAINS(Name_rus__c, "Batch of 500TB traffic"), CONTAINS(Name_rus__c, "Batch of 10 Guides/Landing Pages"), CONTAINS(Name_rus__c, "1 theme"), CONTAINS(Name_rus__c, "Batch of 1K Workflows started"), CONTAINS(Name_rus__c, "Batch of 10K Content Creations") )
CustomField.label: Is Enterprise Pricing Product
